text: Cicero Francis Lowe House is a historic home located at Winston-Salem, Forsyth County, North Carolina. It was designed by architect Willard C. Northup and built in 1911. It is a two-story, Colonial Revival style frame dwelling. It features high chimneys with decorative caps, a high hipped roof, and a classical entrance with projecting semi-circular porch and Ionic order columns. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1984. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Colonial Revival architecture in North Carolina Category:Houses completed in 1911 Category:Houses in Winston-Salem, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Winston-Salem, North Carolina
title: Cicero Francis Lowe House
